go.description: allows the user to exit room using cardinal direction or exit description

put.description: allows the user to place an item in their inventory into their current room

take.description: allows the user to pick up an item in their current room into their inventory

smell.description: allows the user to smell the current room to learn more about their surroundings

listen.description: allows the user to listen in the current room to learn more about their surroundings

look.description: allows the user to look around the current room to learn more about their surroundings

look_at.description: allows the user to look at an item in their inventory or current room

play.description: allows the user to play an item in their current room

smash.description: allows the user to break an item in their inventory

unlock.description: allows the user to unlock an item in their current room

pull.description: allows the user to pull on an item in their current room

uncover.description: allows the user to uncover an item in their current room

pry.description: allows the user to pry an item in their current room - requires crow bar

open.description: allows the user to open an item in their current room

talk.description: allows the user to talk to a human in their current room

inventory.description: allows the user to open their inventory and view the items within it

help.description: allows the user to view all usable actions in the game
